bShowGrid: If true, render grid the preview scene.
bHideUnusedConnectorsSetting: If true, don't render connectors that are not connected to anything.
bRealtimeMaterialViewport: If true, the 3D material preview viewport updates in realtime.
bRealtimeExpressionViewport: If true, the linked object viewport updates in realtime.
bLivePreviewUpdate: If true, always refresh the material preview.
bHideUnrelatedNodes: If true, fade nodes which are not connected to the selected nodes
bAlwaysRefreshAllPreviews: If true, always refresh all expression previews.
bUseUnsortedMenus: If false, use expression categorized menus.
